name: Deep Mine
description:
You landed on an unknown distant planet rich in rare red crystals.

Jump into your mining truck and dig as deep as possible!

FOLLOW US ON TWITTER: https://twitter.com/GGS_official_1

Ludum Dare page: LINK

This is a ludum dare 48 game that was created in 1 day.

If you encounter any bugs or you liked the game or you just want to write something, feel free to leave a comment ;).
